title: Zero-Shot Relabeling of Weak Labels for Fine-Grained Semantic Indexing of Biomedical Literature
details: A Nentidis, A Krithara, G Tsoumakas, G Paliouras - ECAI 2024, 2024
abstract: We address the need for focused retrieval and integration of biomedical literature, enabling improved subject annotation of documents with domain concepts for which no manual labels are available. To do so, we propose a novel zero-shot method …
